      • createImage

        public static void createImage(java.lang.String filename,
               org.eclipse.draw2d.IFigure figure,
               int format)
        Returns the bytes of an encoded image for the specified IFigure in the specified format.
        Parameters:
        filename - the filename
        figure - the Figure to create an image for.
        format - one of SWT.IMAGE_BMP, SWT.IMAGE_BMP_RLE, SWT.IMAGE_GIF SWT.IMAGE_ICO, SWT.IMAGE_JPEG, or SWT.IMAGE_PNG
